customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Turn SQL Logging On
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Login as sysadmin and visit the page
  2. /admin_console/environment/database
  3. Set the SQL Statement Logging field to true and restart the server.
  4. Check the server logs in the page
  5. /admin_console/reporting/server_logs
inline.expectedResult: • When the SQL Statement Logging is turned on, it should print SQL statements in the logs

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) LDAP/Elasticsearch/SQL Trace should be put in server logs — MM-19422
